trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around July 6th 2006
Summary: A flashing object which traveled east to west at a very fast rate of speed,turning south sharply. This was seen for maybe 2 seconds then nothing.
divs: sighting detailswe were in our backyard waiting to see the space shuttle\space station at approximately 9:21p.m.the channel 7 news\weather stated it would be seen at 9:22p.m. from the chicago area. my husband, daughter, and myself were looking up to the sky waiting for the shuttle to come into view. my husband said there is the shuttle. i said,"no that can't be it because they said it would be moving from right to left towards the moon, and shouldn't be blinking.this object came from left to right.as it moved from east to west it turned south. this seemed to take about 5 seconds,before it disappeared.just then the shuttle was spotted by all present, moving from west to east moving towards the moon.just as described on channel 7(local news and weather).we realized then the rate of speed of the blinking object appeared 10 times faster than the shuttle. this blinking object appeared to cross the path of the shuttle right before the shuttle came into view.
